p.s: Teenissues.com has asked me to write a report about my friend's experiences as a volunteer in India.
I thought this would be a nice idea.
The following information are from an extract, written by Bianca L., an 18-year-old German volunteer who worked in an Education Center for children in Delhi.
The best thing in her trip were the children there, because they were so lovely, interested and accepting her immediately.
The best thing about those children were their love for life, which Bianca hasn't seen in German school or kindergarten before.
Considering their situation and experiences, she was surprised how happy they are.
She describes her experience with the children as one of the most valuable days in her entire life, even though she was often tired and frustrated.
She is unbelievably thankful for the kids' love and hope which has filled her life.
I hope you found this report quite interesting and helped you considering doing a similiarsimilar experience.
Report written by John D. on December 16th 2021
